author: dion
msg: Created a repository manager and used it for build processing

author: kschrader
msg: The clover.jar isn't really a build dependency and we probaably shouldn't
have everyone using Maven download it, because of the unresolved licensing
If you want to use it then you can just add the clover depend to your project.

author: vmassol
msg: * created 3 targets for the clover plugin : one for generating the test coverage data and 2 for generating the HTML and swing reports.
* this also fixes the issue concerning the junit fork which is no longer needed
